casebody.data:
IN RE L.M.B., Minor. SC: 157903
COA: 338169 Supreme Court of Michigan. January 8, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion to extend the time for filing the appellant's supplemental brief is GRANTED. The supplemental brief submitted on November 30, 2018, is accepted as timely filed. On further order of the Chief Justice, the motion of attorney Elliot Margolis to withdraw as counsel for appellee Sarna is GRANTED.
